name: Cave Bandits
description:
Intro

Cave Bandits is a procedurally generated cave-dwelling mini game. COLLECT gems as you go THERE into a cave , fetch a specific treasure for an evil guy and get BACK to the entrance, alive!

Every run is different! Try to speedrun it!

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • If you have a wand, use arrow keys to shoot in that direction.
  • Press R to go to main menu
